name: poker-tracker
description: A comprehensive poker tracking application with statistics and analytics

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@poker-tracker/api && npm run build --workspace=@poker-tracker/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=@poker-tracker/api && npm run lint --workspace=@poker-tracker/web
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=@poker-tracker/api && npm run lint:fix --workspace=@poker-tracker/web
scripts.lint:check: npm run lint:check --workspace=@poker-tracker/api && npm run lint:check --workspace=@poker-tracker/web
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=@poker-tracker/api && npm run type-check --workspace=@poker-tracker/web
scripts.check:all: npm run type-check && npm run lint:check && npm test
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint:fix && npm run type-check
